Summary: Three Circular Lights in a field
divs: sighting detailsi live in a somewhat rural part of western maryland. we are on a 2 acre lot and there is another field beyond our property of at least 2 acres or more. about 1:30am, just before i went to bed, i noticed 3 circular lights in the field beyond our property that i'd never seen before. because it is so dark around our homes, it was hard to tell exactly where the light were situated. i went out on to our deck to get a better look, but i still could not determine the distance or the source of the lights. they seemed to be all the same size and equally spaced apart. i took several pictures with a digital camera and using my computer software, i tried to make the image more clear and\or more detailed, but i really couldn't see anything else. i thought perhaps you could shed some light on this incident or perhaps you have the type of equipment to analyze the photographs in more detail. by the way, i have not seen the lights since. because i was not sure that what i was seeing was anything out of the ordinary, i took the pictures and went to bed. they seemed to be stationary and were not moving or pulsating. in addition, there was absolutely no sound. (i noticed this when i went out on to the deck) it wasn't until i started showing them to friends and family that it occured to me that i may have actually caught something unusual. the following night, i look out at the house across the field from us and could plainly see that when they left outside house light on, you could see part of the structure illuminated, so i know that isn't what i saw the night before. i hope you can give me some more information on what this might be. you will notice that the first picture is lighter than the rest. i accidentally had the flash on for the this photo. (i have a few more photos if you would like to have them as well)
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Oakland
There was one other sighting in Oakland on or around July 24th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
